main.name: Yakini Arumuga Kani
main.bio: Hi !!! My name is Yakini. I am a Full Stack Web Development Bootcamp graduate at the University of Utah. Hands-on experience in various technologies helped me build responsive websites that focus mainly on rich user experience.My interest is developing projects on the MERN stack as it is more smooth, comfortable, and exciting.I graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Engineering. I had worked as Programmer Analyst and as a Test Engineer.I look forward to new web development opportunities and find a workplace where I can apply my skills and widen my knowledge.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details..

education.degree: Certificate in Full Stack Web Developer Bootcamp

work.title: Performance Test Engineer
work.description: Executed Manual and Performance Testing for various applications

projects.title: Shifty Planner
projects.category: Shift management and time keeping system with a focus on the needs of first responders. Technologies Used : MongoDB, Node, Express, React

projects.title: The Fight Club
projects.category: Real time gaming app where two users can fight with each other, and at the end of the game displays their scores. Technologies Used : Node, Express, SocketIO, MySQL, Handlebars

projects.title: Space Exploration
projects.category: Mobile-focused web app where users can explore, and know about the space related stuffs from NASA API. Technologies Used : HTML, Materialize CSS, Javascript, JQuery, ThirdPartyAPIs

projects.title: Coding Quiz
projects.category: Web app where users have to answer the Javascript questionnaire within the given time. Technologies Used : HTML, CSS, Javascript

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.category: Mobile-focused web app where users can see the weather details of a city, using third party API. Technologies Used : HTML, Bootstrap CSS, Javascript, JQuery, Third Party API.

projects.title: Workday Scheduler
projects.category: Web Apllication that helps the user to save events for each hour of the day. Technologies Used : HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery

projects.title: Eat-Da Burger
projects.category: Eat-Da Burger is an application which helps to add the burgers, and can get the burger `Devoured` by pressing the `Devour it!`. Technologies Used : Node, Express, Handlebars, MySQL, ORM

projects.title: Note taker
projects.category: The purpose of this application is to develop a note taker that can be used to write, save, and delete notes. Technologies Used : HTML, Bootstrap CSS, Node, Express.

projects.title: Good ReadMe Generator
projects.category: This application focuses on dynamically generate a high quality README file using command line application. Technologies Used : Node, Inquirer, Axios.

projects.title: Team Generator
projects.category: The purpose of this project is to build a Node CLI that takes in information about employees and generates an HTML webpage that displays the collected details. Technologies Used : Node, Inquirer, Jest.

projects.title: Employee Tracker
projects.category: This purpose of this assignment is to build a CLI that provides solution for managing a company's employees using node, inquirer, and MySQL. Technologies Used : Node, Inquirer, MySQL.

testimonials.text: Yakini is a proactive and tireless contributor who naturally rises to the occasion when presented with something she is passionate about. She's always the first one to take initiative, be it solving complex problems, being there for someone in their hard time, or turning a heated discussion into a civilized conversation. She comes with a great attitude, a can-do spirit, and delivers products with passion, and is one of the highly-rated developers on my list.
